translation.Message_0_Page_0: My name is <name_npc>. I'm just a medic.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Military life was pretty normal until everybody started turning.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: I was stationed at Le Mans Hospital for defence and to provide medical assistance, but we were eventually ordered to evacuate to Marseille.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: And well, <color=legendary>Colonel Jourdan</color> filled you in what happened there. Now I'm here.
